Lyric:
[by:张大毛的短颈鹿脖子很长]
[01:03.93]Here I go again
[01:05.83]Somewhere between the tide and the sunrise
[01:08.82]Is a palce called paradise
[01:12.0]Follow me my friend
[01:14.62]We'll jump off the edge into the twighlight
[01:17.12]And I'll meet you there in paradise
[01:20.9]Here I go again
[01:22.66]Somewhere between the tide and the sunrise
[01:25.33]Is a palce called paradise
[01:28.8]Follow me my friend
[01:30.46]We'll jump off the edge into the twighlight
[01:33.44]And I'll meet you there in paradise
[01:37.0]

[02:07.79]I could drift away with you beside me
[02:11.92]Being with you baby
[02:14.67]Wanna know what this is about
[02:17.36]I love your smile under perfect skies
[02:20.81]Forget space and time
[02:22.69]Welcome to paradise
[02:26.53]I don't wanna go to sleep
[02:30.11]I just wanna stay in my dream
[02:34.8]The stars will light the way to the destination
[02:37.62]Come on times are wasting
[02:39.36]Won't you follow me now
[02:40.96]Here I go again
[02:43.11]Somewhere between the tide and the sunrise
[02:45.95]Is a palce called paradise
[02:49.00]Follow me my friend
[02:50.71]We'll jump off the edge into the twighlight
[02:53.32]And I'll meet you there in paradise
[02:57.93]Here I go again
[02:59.76]Somewhere between the tide and the sunrise
[03:02.79]Is a palce called paradise
[03:05.02]Follow me my friend
[03:06.08]We'll jump off the edge into the twighlight
[03:09.86]And I'll meet you there in paradise
[03:15.0]

[03:26.81]Won't you follow me now
[03:28.87]Here I go again
[03:30.86]Somewhere between the tide and the sunrise
[03:33.47]Is a palce called paradise
[03:36.79]Follow me my friend
[03:38.88]We'll jump off the edge into the twighlight
[03:41.62]And I'll meet you there in paradise
[03:48.9]
